text: The Sarlat Rugby Club is a French rugby union club based in Sarlat-la-Can√©da. From 2020, the first team is referred to as Sarlat rugby. He evolves in 2020-2021 in the Federal 2 championship . == Stadium == In 1926, the CAS bought the plots with a total area of 1 ha 43a 80ca for a price of 11,000 francs. 6,000 are paid by the club, the remaining 5,000 from the funds of ten loyal Sarladais supporters11, repayable over 10 years . == References == Category:Rugby union clubs
